tweettext: Since we love spread knowledge - beside the UAF discussed here (CVE-2018-0965), in the same function (vpcivsp!VirtualBusChannelProcessPacket) there was an info disclosure: uninitialized local structure on the stack sent to the guest via VirtualBusPacketComplete (CVE-2018-0964)
